description:
Plug is fully recovered and has been overzealously trying to work overtime to make up for her absence at work, which catches the attention of their superior.  While waiting in their superior`s office they meet the ultra-beautiful and super elite Roden-chan.  Introductions and formalities can wait as there`s a huge power leakage that Juden and Aresta must attend to...as well as protect Sento?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Audit Office Special Department - Short-Circuit Girls
監査室特務部・漏電ちゃん!
